metadata.title: CVE-2022-26709 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-26709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

notes.note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.36.3-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
wpewebkit package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
